line.originaltext: 1 cup butter
1 cup vegetable oil
1 cup white sugar
1 cup packed brown sugar
2 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
4 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
2 teaspoons baking soda
4 teaspoons cream of tartar
1 teaspoon salt
2 cups semisweet chocolate chips
1 cup chopped walnuts (optional)
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing12, "Creamed butter", "Creame until smooth")

line.originaltext: Beat in the eggs and vanilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing4, ing5}, ing13, "Butter mixture", "Beat in")

line.originaltext: Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing14, "Dough", "Combine and stir")

line.originaltext: Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets.
line.annotation: cut(ing15, , ing16, "cookie drops", "drop dough with Rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet")

line.originaltext: Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown.
Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a couple of minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
